__e: Now, before I make out your chart, may I ask who recommended you to our solarium?
I've got a registered letter and the mail won't deliver itself! - 'Bye, Déodat.
I recommended, the next time he felt an episode coming on, that he go for a quiet stroll in the local cemetery.
You think that because I recommended you for the job in DC that I don't care that you might move to DC?
I don't think that's advisable at this time, but I'll let you know.
The recommendations for your recovery include not talking about or thinking about what happened during the Process.
Well, and 'why usually you should never take a shift of 13 hours first day that you leave the hospital.
But it was recommended for you to rest. It could have been much worse.
But... I did get a name of the person who referred him to the hat shop.
He was referred to us by a very good customer. Jonathan Phelps.
I'm sorry, but our house is most exclusive one needs an introduction
But I made him think that I'd been vouched for by a member, so they let me in.

So, when you told the doctor... that you tricked me into letting you play golf... he recommended more golf?
Poor guy spent his life in prison and urged me to follow in his footsteps, so... -

The doctor thought the boys needed a change of air.
